response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a perfect match for your needs. Given its worth to you, I propose to sell it to you for $950,000. I am confident this price reflects its true value while offering you an exceptional deal. Should you choose to accept this offer, it would be a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know your decision at your earliest convenience. Thank you for considering this proposal.", "product_price": 950000}
